parameters.name: Sd
parameters.description: True for single-ended, false for double-ended

parameters.name: Dir
parameters.description: True to reverse the direction of the extrude, false to not

parameters.name: StartCond
parameters.description: Start condition as defined in swStartConditions_e

parameters.name: OffsetVal
parameters.description: Offset value

parameters.name: T1
parameters.description: Termination type for first end as defined in swEndConditions_e

parameters.name: T2
parameters.description: Termination type for second end as defined in swEndConditions_e (valid only if Sd = false)

parameters.name: D1
parameters.description: Depth of extrusion for first end in meters

parameters.name: D2
parameters.description: Depth of extrusion for second end in meters (valid only if Sd = false)

parameters.name: Dchk1
parameters.description: True allows draft angle in first direction, false does not allow drafting

parameters.name: Dchk2
parameters.description: True allows draft angle in second direction, false does not allow drafting (valid only if Sd = false)

parameters.name: Ddir1
parameters.description: True for first draft angle to be outward, false for first draft angle to be inward

parameters.name: Ddir2
parameters.description: True for second draft angle to be outward, false for second draft angle to be inward (valid only if Sd = false)

parameters.name: Dang1
parameters.description: Draft angle for first end

parameters.name: Dang2
parameters.description: Draft angle for second end (valid only if Sd = false)

parameters.name: OffsetReverse1
parameters.description: If you choose to offset the first end condition from another face or plane, then true specifies the offset from the face or plane in a direction away from the sketch, and false specifies the offset in a direction toward the sketch

parameters.name: OffsetReverse2
parameters.description: If you choose to offset the second end condition from another face or plane, then true specifies the offset from the face or plane in a direction away from the sketch, and false specifies the offset in a direction toward the sketch (valid only if Sd = false)

parameters.name: TranslateSurface1
parameters.description: If you specified T1 as swEndConditions_e.swEndCondOffsetFromSurface, then true specifies that the end of the extrusion is a translation of the reference surface, and false specifies to use a true offset

parameters.name: TranslateSurface2
parameters.description: If you specified T2 as swEndConditions_e.swEndCondOffsetFromSurface, then true specifies that the end of the extrusion is a translation of the reference surface, and false specifies to use a true offset (valid only if Sd = false)

parameters.name: CapEnd1
parameters.description: True to cap first end, false to not

parameters.name: CapEnd2
parameters.description: True to cap second end, false to not (valid only if Sd = false)

parameters.name: DeleteOriginalFace
parameters.description: True to delete original faces, false to not (valid only if Sd = true)

parameters.name: KnitResult
parameters.description: True to knit the extrusion result, false to not (valid only if Sd = true and DeleteOriginalFace = true)

remarks:
Before calling this method, select the entities for the extruded surface using
IModelDocExtension::SelectByID2
.
Entity
Mark
Base
2D or 3D sketch
Sketch segments
Single planar face
Multiple co-planar faces
